text:
@marcorubio Stupidity in believing Florida’s elected representatives?

Stop talking in riddles, tell it straight. 
Don’t tell us about what “Isn’t” and call it great news.

Tell us what IS.
As in how many people died of COVID-19 in Florida today?

You spin faster than a propeller.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
